New Records: Heinrich Klaasen and David Miller stitched a 79-run stand for the 5th wicket -- a record for South Africa in men's T20 World Cup 2024.
Key Match Events: Tanzim Sakib picked 3 wickets in the powerplay, rattling the South African top-order.
Tanzim Sakib got the wicket of Reeza Hendricks for 0 in the first over.
Tanzim Sakib dismissed Quinton de Kock for 18 in his second over.
Tanzim Sakib got the wicket of Tristan Stubbs for 0, finishing with figures of 3 for 18.
Taskin Ahmed got the wickets of Aiden Markram and Heinrich Klaasen.
South Africa were restricted to 113 for 6 in their quota of 20 overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Tanzim Sakib acknowledged the incredible support for their team during the match.
Tanzim Sakib mentioned that the strong crowd motivated them after South Africa won the toss and opted to bowl.
Tanzim Sakib expressed his appreciation for the crowd's support.
Tanzim Sakib stated that De Kock's wicket was his favorite as it was crucial.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Close to 25,000 fans filled the stands in New York for the game.
Bangladesh fans dominated the crowd at the 34,000-seater Nassau County Cricket Ground.
The crowd for the match was the second-biggest at the venue after the India vs Pakistan match on June 9.
